attributes.action: Provide EU citizens living in the UK with reciprocal Health Care
attributes.additional_details: Please discuss and agree favourable, reciprocal agreements to continue health Cover
attributes.background: Currently, EU citizens residing in the UK benefit via reciprocal arrangements for healthcare - the EU has promised that reciprocal arrangements for UK citizens living in the EU

rejection.details:
The Government has said that EU citizens living lawfully in the UK on the day the UK leaves the EU will be able to use the NHS, as they do now, after that date. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/healthcare-for-eu-and-efta-nationals-living-in-the-uk

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
